item.title: Lisa add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "You're going to come across people in your life who will say all the right words at all the right times. But in the end, it's always their actions you should judge them by. It's actions, not words, that matter." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Lisa add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Lisa add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Joyce Meyer (Author)
item.description: "Happiness is not a feeling, it is a choice. To be happy, one must choose to be happy, not respond to a circumstance that now controls your happiness." -- Joyce Meyer (Author)

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Max Lucado
item.description: "A woman's heart should be so hidden in God that a man has to seek Him just to find her." -- Max Lucado

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Max Lucado
item.description: "Faith is not the belief that God will do what you want. It is the belief that God will do what is right." -- Max Lucado

item.title: Lisa add a quote by John Grisham
item.description: "Critics should find meaningful work." -- John Grisham

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Anita Diamant
item.description: "I had Benia's hands, Meryt's friendship, the feel of newborn flesh, the smiles of new mothers, a little girl who laughed in my kitchen, a house of my own. It was more than enough." -- Anita Diamant

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Francine Rivers
item.description: "Beloved, surrender wholeheartedly to Jesus Christ, who loves you. As you drink from the deep well of Scripture, the Lord will refresh you and cleanse you, mold you and re-create you through His Living Word. For the Bible is the very breath of God, giving life eternal to those who seek Him." -- Francine Rivers

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Elizabeth Stone
item.description: "Making the decision to have a child - it is momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking around outside your body. " -- Elizabeth Stone

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Dan Brown
item.description: "Faith â€• acceptance of which we imagine to be true, that which we cannot prove." -- Dan Brown

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Anita Diamant
item.description: "The painful things seemed like knots on a beautiful necklace, necessary for keeping the beads in place." -- Anita Diamant

item.title: Lisa add a quote by John Shors
item.description: "A sibling would be the one person in the whole world who would be with you from birth until death. At every step, she or he would be there." -- John Shors

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Adriana Trigiani
item.description: "...I've made it my business to observe fathers and daughters. And I've seen some incredible, beautiful things. Like the little girl who's not very cute - her teeth are funny, and her hair doesn't grow right, and she's got on thick glasses - but her father holds her hand and walks with her like she's a tiny angel that no one can touch. He gives her the best gift a woman can get in this world: protection. And the little girl learns to trust the man in her life. And all the things that the world expects from women - to be beautiful, to soothe the troubled spirit, heal the sick, care for the dying, send the greeting card, bake the cake - allof those things become the way we pay the father back for protecting us..." -- Adriana Trigiani
